title: Choosing the Right Database for a Food Delivery Web Application: A Developer's Guide
content: As a junior software developer, one of the critical decisions you'll make when building a food delivery web application is choosing the right database. This guide will help you understand the factors to consider when selecting a database for your project.

title: How to Hack Your Productivity and Achieve More in Less Time
content: If you're like most people, you probably have a long list of tasks to accomplish. This article provides tips and strategies to enhance your productivity and get more done in less time.

title: Enhance Your VS Code Experience with These Amazing Features
content: Visual Studio Code (VS Code) is a popular code editor that supports a wide range of programming languages and extensions. Discover some amazing features that can enhance your coding experience with VS Code.

title: How Did I Get Into Software Development?
content: I have always been fascinated by computers and how they work. Ever since I was a kid, I loved playing video games and tinkering with technology. This article shares my journey into the world of software development.
